text:
Steven "Steve" Trenbirth is an Australian movie director, animator and movie producer known for directing "The Jungle Book 2". He worked for The Walt Disney Company since 1990.
In 2002, Trenbirth left Disney to form his own animation company Mad Cow Pictures. He is also known for directing "The Adventures of Charlotte and Henry" and "The Legend of Secret Pass".

annotations.surface_form: The Adventures of Charlotte and Henry
